mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.parent_Id AS "parent_Id", a.materialcode AS "materialcode", a.materialname AS "materialname", a.size AS "size", a.quantity AS "quantity", a.num AS "num", a.unitprice AS "unitprice", a.money AS "money", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
LEFT JOIN account_arrival b ON b.id = a.parent_Id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO account_arrival_detail( id, parent_Id, materialcode, materialname, size, unitprice, money, quantity, num, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{parent_Id}, #{materialcode}, #{materialname}, #{size}, #{unitprice}, #{money}, #{quantity}, #{num}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE account_arrival_detail SET parent_Id = #{parent_Id}, materialCode=#{materialcode}, materialname = #{materialname}, size = #{size}, unitprice = #{unitprice}, money = #{money}, quantity = #{quantity}, num = #{num}, del_flag=#{delFlag} WHERE id = #{id}
